name: Gnomegeddon: War of the Gardens
description:
* This project is in very early development, the main usage of this page is to gain feedback so we can continue to develop the game further.

Take the fight to the gnomes in Gnomegeddon: War of the Gardens! 

Gnomegeddon: War of the Gardens is an isometric shooter where you blast your way through hordes of gnomes protecting their homeland with all guns blazing!

Current Content:

  • 6 Playable Tanks.
  • 3 Worlds (Gardens, Arid and Snowlands).
  • 3 Unique Bosses.
  • 6 Enemy Types.

-   Explore 3 Unique Zones!

-   Destroy Gnomes in Style with 6 Different Tank Styles with Unique Stats!

-   Loads of Enemy Types!

-   3 Unique Bosses for Each Zone!
